game.name: Medieval Defense Z
game.description:
The extremely dangerous apocalypse has just begun and you as a brave man have taken care of dealing this difficult situation. This is the time when you have reached the middle ages where the black death turned into something worse and danger. Oh my God! The Earth is now full of the dead. In order to survive, you need to fight against the undead. Will you be able to accept this challenge? Join Medieval Defense Z and be prepared to enter the castle where your job is to protect yourself from the coming darkness!
These life-threatening and blood-thirsty zombies will try every possible effort to kill you. Hold your horse, and use your weapons to clear the area from these deadly zombies in this brand new action-packed game! Make sure to provide your donkey with the needful protection as the undead walkers in different waves will keep chasing him. Apply your archers to fight off waves of attacking undead and make them show that you are a true fighter! Grab money and use it to upgrade your powers!
You can defend your king along with your loyal donkey with the help of power-up archers! You can upgrade speed, damage and firepower. The completion of each stage will help you to earn one upgrade like arrows rain, extra health and other devastating powers. You can charge your special attacks by reaching the advanced level. Do every possible effort to reach the castle alive and complete your game like a real fighter! Check out some other free HTML5 shooting games and have a blast online without download!
